name: rxmethod-migrate-cli
description: CLI tool for migrating async/await methods to RxMethod implementations

scripts.build: tsc cli.ts --outDir dist --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --allowSyntheticDefaultImports
scripts.build:watch: tsc cli.ts --outDir dist --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --allowSyntheticDefaultImports --watch
scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/cli.js status

author: ForgeFlow
